tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I would not recommend this doctor.****** *** * ****** **** **** ** unfriendly and disrespectful attitude. He was too rude. 
He asked me if I want take medicine or injection. Which I was not sure of, so I said tablet is ok but also asked which one is recommended (injection or tablets) . To that his reply was, I give injections only. So we asked him to write the injections if he recommends so.Then he was like, "you are wasting my time", by then we would have hardly consumed 2mins of his time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I can write a long story but I don't intend to spend any more time on this doctor. It's been very disappointing getting treated from him (without results) and dealing with his arrogant ways.

Quick words/terms for this doctor and his team ******* ****************************** *********** **** ******* ******* *** ** *** **** ***** **** **** ****** ********* 
‚ÄåAsk him about treatment expenses in advance, he would just avoid and later charge a bomb. 
‚ÄåAsk him about details of your health situation, he would just say he has resolved everything. If an issue emerges later, ** ***** **** ***** ******* ** **** ** ********
‚ÄåIf you change city and need to consult him again, he wouldn't even get on a quick video call. Such care for his patients!

 I got my right thumb treated by him, in May 2022,  viaRP treatment followed by few weeks of casting. On requesting him for a quick documented summary of the treatment for future reference (as I was changing cities), he behaved like God saying "Now you don't need to worry about it. No need to see any doctor". Few weeks after treatment, my case has worsened, I may need surgery now but he won't even get onto a video call for further guidance which would help me share history with next doctor.

I am not going to keep myself anonymous and open to any debate or discussions on my review

Mandeep Singh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Knee Pain Treatment,Joint and Muscle Problems,
review:
I am writing this review after an year of treatment to my mother and wife. I am basically a pharma professional. The reason for writing this review is to benefit the patients not the doctor. Because it is important for a patient to find the right and genuine doctor in this competitive environment. 
Coming to Dr. Jayini P Rammohen, I had visited him at Revive clinic in lingampally initially and later at Pace hospital for treatment of my mother and also my wife. He politely listened to them explained what went wrong and what needs to be done. ** *** ***** *** **** ********* ****** Above all he gives lot of confidence to the patient. I am not giving the details of treatment here but I wanted to underline that he is more focused on accurate diagnosis of the problem and giving the right medication to correct that, which makes the doctor great. He correlated different tests results and explained the possible reasons for that. In addition the physiotherapists who worked under him are well qualified and trained by the doctor. Doctor is compassionate and  empathetic to the patient needs. He also suggested the places for fitness equipment where I can get at an affordable price. He is passionate towards his profession but not the money. Please keep up the great spirit sir. Thank you.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ** ******** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** ******. I am a 25-year-old male, when I was 17 years old I had a basketball injury that led to a ligament tear in my right knee. I was never able to treat it since then because no doctors could detect it. Everywhere I go they used to give me some ointments and send me back home. I was under the impression that I have knee pains because I was overweight. When I moved to Hyderabad, a¬†similar thing happened to me once again. my knee used to hurt when I was hitting the gym. I went to doctor Jayani, he listened to my story, asked me to walk, he observed my walk, just my walk. without any physical contact or examination, he said, "How are you even able to walk, your ligament is torn. Your leg wobbles when you take steps". I was shocked to hear that. I mean it's a 7-year-old injury, I might have consulted 4-5 doctors since then and none of them told me that this might be something bigger than just an overweight knee pain issue. 
Last year I got my knee operated by Dr. Jayani. It's been over 16 months and never ever have I looked back since. Thanks, Doctor Jayani!! You are truly amazing!
Time management.  I has to wait 1 hrthen what is the point of taking appointment.  Doctor was good. Staff was nice.
Doctor was very friendly and explained issue clearly .I went to 2 doctors before but I couldn't understand the issue itself ..I am happy to visit this doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ** ******** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** ******. I am a 25-year-old male, when I was 17 years old I had a basketball injury that led to a ligament tear in my right knee. I was never able to treat it since then because no doctors could detect it. Everywhere I go they used to give me some ointments and send me back home. I was under the impression that I have knee pains because I was overweight. When I moved to Hyderabad, a¬†similar thing happened to me once again. my knee used to hurt when I was hitting the gym. I went to doctor Jayani, he listened to my story, asked me to walk, he observed my walk, just my walk. without any physical contact or examination, he said, "How are you even able to walk, your ligament is torn. Your leg wobbles when you take steps". I was shocked to hear that. I mean it's a 7-year-old injury, I might have consulted 4-5 doctors since then and none of them told me that this might be something bigger than just an overweight knee pain issue. 
Last year I got my knee operated by Dr. Jayani. It's been over 16 months and never ever have I looked back since. Thanks, Doctor Jayani!! You are truly amazing!
Doctor was really good and explained well about the problem.............. I strongly recommend him.

I visited Jayani Clinics after I had accidentally twisted my ankle and had immense pain in my leg with swelling. Doctor properly examined my leg and it was a great deal that doctor explained the entire problem to me. After having an xray, doctor said it is fractured however it is level 1 sprain and gave meditation. Along with that he also suggested/demonstrated exercise that I need to after my swelling is reduced. Doctor also suggested for Vitamin D, B12 and Calcium test, which came out as deficient for me. I am currently getting vitamin shots. I am extremely satisfied and thank doctor jayani..!! 

A big thank you to the extremely polite and skilled staff of the clinic!! :)

tags: Wait time,
review: I didn't get a chance to meet the doctor , so didn't want to add a review to doctor but definitely want to share my experience with thier adminstration.  I did a prior booking . I went 30mins before but the Administration was very bad. They were serving first cum first even after taking appointment. I still waited because there were patients more critical then me. After 1 hr I started asking them for my visit but they kept on saying 10mins more . I waited for 90mins , even after that also they were that my turn will come after 2 more patients. Finally I had to leave the place n visit another doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Jayini Ram Mohan is such a cool Doctor.  Visited 2 times for ankle sprain (sports injury). No wait time for first time and had waited for 45 mins for second time. Doctor has such a cool attitude. Clearly listens and speaks out our problems and suggests best medicines/physciotheraphy. There is lots of difference between 15 days of treatment of another doctors and 3 days of Dr. Jayini's treatment.Consultation fee and test costs are a bit high, but in areas like Kothaguda/Kondapur/Gachibowli/Hitech, where the cost of living is pretty much high, theres no such preference except health when it can be treated in such a good way, money comes later.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: Never again.. I came out of the Dr room without any clarity on the problem. Dr hardly took any time to respond to my questions and rather asked to Google *** ** ** ** **********************
reply_text:
Good Morning, 

You have visited me in two sessions, 

1st day i explained you anatomy , mechanism of injury and advised to get an MRI to conform my diagnosis,  
2nd Day u came with MRI scan i told you there is complete tear u need surgery the earliest before there is collateral damage of other structures of your knee as you are walking on same injured knee, Both the days i spend explaining you the things for more than 30 min out of humanitarian basis even though your time slot was 15 min because you had trauma,

If I was not clear in explaining things, I am Sorry for that, please find better surgeon  who can explain you more clearly and can do a better surgery with good outcome, 
Thanks for making me realise that i have to be more clear in explaining while talking to my patients
